title: Holtzappel Dutch Account of Comoros Primary SAQ

content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpt, respond to parts a, b, and c. Identify ONE claim made by the author in the second paragraph. Explain ONE way the Comorians’ clothing or material possessions, as described in the first paragraph, were influenced by their islands’ participation in long-distance trade networks. Explain ONE reason why a Dutch East India Company official such as Holtzappel might have reported about the economic and cultural activities of the people of the Comoros Islands.

frqParts.text: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpt, respond to parts a, b, and c. Identify ONE claim made by the author in the second paragraph. Explain ONE way the Comorians’ clothing or material possessions, as described in the first paragraph, were influenced by their islands’ participation in long-distance trade networks. Explain ONE reason why a Dutch East India Company official such as Holtzappel might have reported about the economic and cultural activities of the people of the Comoros Islands.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
